Detailed Description

Represents a 16 bit integer in little endian format.

Field Documentation

UINT8 LittleEndian16Bit::m_a

UINT16 LittleEndian16Bit::m_uint16
 

struct { ... } LittleEndian16Bit::m_uint8
 

UINT8 LittleEndian16Bit::m_uint8_ar[2]
 

union { ... } LittleEndian16Bit::m_val
 

Data union member which defines several access methods to the little endian number Byte member access (m_a, m_b) gives access to byte components in ascending order (i.e. LittleEndian16Bit(Native16Bit(0xaabb)) will result in m_a = 0xaa, m_b = 0xbb)
